subject: Golf
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Souchak was a leading pro golfer of the 1950s and early ’60s who set a PGA Tour record for the lowest 72-hole score in 1955 that stood for 46 years.
snippet: Mr. Souchak was a leading pro golfer of the 1950s and early ’60s who set a PGA Tour record for the lowest 72-hole score in 1955 that stood for 46 years.
